features: HYDRATE AND BRIGHTEN - formulated to increase moisturization by 28x for an intensive hydrating treatment with added skin brightening benefits. Our proprietary patented HYDRODEEPER complex with essential moisturizing factors helps improve hydration and maintain a healthy skin barrier.

WATER 3X COMPLEX - deeply hydrates and gives skin an instant glow for soft, smooth, de-stressed skin. Deep Sea Water, Aquasil and Glyceryl Glucoside delivers intensive long-lasting hydration to skin so skin looks and feels renewed.

BIODEGRADABLE SHEET - This VEGAN certified, eco-friendly sheet is silky soft and firmly hugs skin for optimal absorption of our powerful essence. Enhanced mask shape comfortably fits all face shapes. Tested and safe for sensitive skin.

FSC CERTIFIED + SOY INK PRINTED CARTONS - MEDIHEAL uses sustainable packaging certified to meet the environmental and social standards for FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) and print with eco-friendly soy-based ink.

HOW TO USE: 1. After cleansing and toning, apply mask. 2. Pull upward to fit the mask tightly to face, adjusting to fit around eyes, nose and mouth. 3. Relax for 10 - 20 minutes. 4. Remove and discard the mask. Lightly tap remaining essence to help it absorb into skin.
body.description: Mediheal Watermide Essential Mask Hydrate and brighten Hydrate and brighten depleted skin with three comforting long-lasting forms of moisture and Niacinamide. This 2-in-1 mask delivers intensive hydration while giving skin an instant brightening boost. How To Use After cleansing and toning, apply mask.Pull upward to fit the mask tightly to face, adjusting to fit around eyes, nose and mouth. Relax for 10 - 20 minutes. Remove and discard the mask. Lightly tap remaining essence to help it absorb into skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mediheal Watermide Essential Mask Hydrate and brighten Hydrate and brighten depleted skin with three comforting long-lasting forms of moisture and Niacinamide. This 2-in-1 mask delivers intensive hydration while giving skin an instant brightening boost. How To Use After cleansing and toning, apply mask.Pull upward to fit the mask tightly to face, adjusting to fit around eyes, nose and mouth. Relax for 10 - 20 minutes. Remove and discard the mask. Lightly tap remaining essence to help it absorb into skin. Water 3X Complex FSC Certified + Soy Ink Printed Cartons

Water 3X Complex Water 1X Deep Sea Water "Deep Sea Water" extracted from the uncontaminated eastern coast of Korea, Gosung, which contains abundant minerals. Water 2X Aquasil A patent hydrating ingredient that contains glucose and xylitol, components derived from birch tree and beech tree. Water 3X Glyceryl Glucoside Aquaporin* activity that transports water molecules and glycerol to various parts of the skin in the same way that water is absorbed by the roots of plants and to supply water to stems and leaves. *Aquaporin (AQP)=water inside skin

VEGAN CERTIFIED SHEET This VEGAN certified sheet is silky soft and firmly hugs skin for optimal absorption of our powerful essence.Enhanced mask shape comfortably fits all face shapes.Tested and safe for sensitive skin.

Mediheal's Sustainable Cartons FSC CERTIFIED + SOY INK PRINTED CARTONS MEDIHEAL uses sustainable packaging certified to meet the environmental and social standards for FSC and print with soy-based ink.

Collagen Essential Mask Teatree Essential Mask Watermide Essential Mask Madecassoside Essential Mask Placenta Essential Mask Vita Essential Mask Benefits FIRM, PLUMP AND RESTORE SKIN PROVEN TO SOOTHE IRRITATED SKIN AND IMPROVE SKIN BALANCE HYDRATE AND BRIGHTEN TREAT BLEMISHES AND POST-BLEMISH MARKS NOURISH AND HYDRATE BRIGHTEN, TONE AND ADD RADIANCE Main Ingredients Collagen Active 3X Complex - firms, visibly plumps for younger looking skin Tea Tree Active 3X Complex - intensely calms and soothes for blemish-free skin Water 3X Complex - deeply hydrates and gives skin an instant glow for soft, smooth, de-stressed skin Cica 3X Complex - proven to improve cell turnover for clear, even looking skin Phyto-Placenta 3X Complex - rich in amino acids, antioxidants, vitamins and minerals to nourish, hydrate the skin Vita Active 3X Complex - instantly adds luminosity to skin for a brighter more even looking complexion Count 10 Pack 10 Pack 10 Pack 10 Pack 10 Pack 10 Pack Recommended Application Time 10-20 minutes 10-20 minutes 10-20 minutes 10-20 minutes 10-20 minutes 10-20 minutes FSC Certified, Soy Ink Printed Carton ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-irritating ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This leaves my skin, feeling so good and so moisturized and the Dewey look to it afterwards is so amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good face mask

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really works!
reviews.reviewText: My face was so dry and so wrinkly when I smiled. After 3 sheets every other night, my skin now looks much more improved with the tiny wrinkles on my smiling face 90% diminished. Just a quick note on how I used the mask: I placed it on my face and left it there until it was dry, so about 2 hours. Strongly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST FACEMASK! Very hydrating
reviews.reviewText: These masks are so good I swear by these. They are so hydrating. I love these. I will keep repurchasing these forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is consistently my favorite hydrating face mask by this great brand. It is incredibly hydrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beats a moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I needed something stronger than my regular daily moisturizer and this mask did the job! I would definitely recommend for extremely dry wintery skin or a good refresher after a peel. This one left my skin feeling silky instead of sticky which is always a plus. Very pleased and will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do like this product. I’m happy I listened to online recommendations for this brand and caved and tried these to see how they are, it’s 100% hydrating, no doubt about it. Only reason I give 4/5 is that its VERY VERY hydrating, to the point of where it leaves a bit of a sheen/oily shine on the skin thats pretty noticeable in the mirror and to other people id assume. I wouldn’t recommend these specific ones (watermide) to someone with oily skin, maybe try the collagen ones instead or the others but definitely to someone with dry/combo/sensitive skin like me i’d say to try this one. Just make sure you dont have somewhere to be afterwards and use it maybe before bed or while lounging for a few hours because of that weird sheen it leaves lol. But overall very hydrating, little smell and non irritating for my sensitive skin which is good :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I adore these masks. They are a great little boost to one’s everyday skin routine. They always leave my skin glowing and are fantastic for sensitive skin.
Tried it because of BTS ahah, love the mask, hydrates my skin sol well. Bought more 😍
このシリーズは大好きでいつも使っているのですが、タップリ液も入っていてとてもいいです。また安くなったらまとめ買いします！

if you're allergic/sensitive to fragrance like me you should probably stray away from this product. I woke up with tiny bumps all over my face and this usually doesn't happen after I use a sheet mask. I will say it is very hydrating but just not for my skin type.
むかしのメディヒールつかってみてリニューアルされたので変えてみたら保湿力抜群でとてもよかったです
